import React from "react"; import { BsTwitter } from "react-icons/bs"; import { ImLocation } from "react-icons/im"; import { FaLink } from "react-icons/fa"; import { HiOutlineBuildingOffice2 } from "react-icons/hi2"; const UserCard = ({ data }) => { console.log(data); return ( <>

{data?.name || "not found"}

{data?.login || "not updated"}

Joined {data?.created_at?.slice(0, 10) || "not updated"}

{data?.bio || "not updated"}

Repos {data?.public_repos || 0}
Followers {data?.followers || 0}
{" "}
Following {data?.following || 0}

{data?.location || "not updated"}

{data?.twitter_username || "not updated"}

{data?.blog || "not updated"}

{data?.company || "not updated"}

); }; export default UserCard; //
